info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 1:39PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN MERCER COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 139 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Greenville, or 14 miles northeast of Hermitage, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hermitage, Stoneboro, Clark, Fredonia, Jackson Center, Sheakleyville, and Maurice K Goddard State Park. This includes Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 121 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
